casebody.data:
Howe v. Semon et al. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. May 7,1888.) Appeal from jury term. Action by Mary Howe, administratrix, etc., against John G. Semon and others. Plaintiff appeals from an order dismissing the complaint.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

James A. Hudson, for appellant. Edmund Coffin, Jr., for respondents. Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
